comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: You can bet on freebitco.in with any amount you want. As far as I know they won’t ever limit your bet amount because it is how designed their casino. To be more precise, when you bet on a team on freebitco.in, you are betting against other players. (Parimutuel betting) So the winrate/prize changes real time. It doesn’t matter if you bet 1 btc or 1000 btc. Everything gets calculated on the go so It don’t make sense to limit players bet size there.
